name: Penguin Fight
description:
This game is quite not-finished and we are sorry that we may not be able to fix those bugs before Ludum Dare 49 ends so... Here it is!

Fight by jumping towards other penguins and beat them down the iceberg.

Stay longer if you can!

"OMG I can belive we still have to fight with all these capacities." -Yourself

Taste better on Android!
